amendment.description: To provide authority for title I, relative to hazardous fuels reduction on federal land.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2045 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 31. Record Vote Number: 427.

Amendment SA 2045 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR 10/31/2003 S13626-13631; text: CR 10/31/2003 S13626) To provide authority for title I, relative to hazardous fuels reduction on federal land.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2045 proposed by Senator Harkin.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2045 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 31. Record Vote Number: 427.
